title: Tech journalist covering OceanGate points to misinformation swirling around Titanic sub
19-year-old Titan passenger was 'terrified' before trip, his aunt says
description: The sister of Shahzada Dawood and aunt to his son, Suleman, spoke after the disappearance and presumed deaths of her relatives in the Titan submersible.

title: 'It's horrifying': Discord CEO on child abuse issues after NBC News investigation
description: Discord CEO Jason Citron said Thursday that he found reports of child exploitation on the popular chat platform "horrifying" and that the Discord took the issue "very seriously."

title: House postpones Biden impeachment vote, sending matter to committees
description: The House sent a measure to impeach President Joe Biden to committees, delaying a vote that has created headaches for Kevin McCarthy and sparked GOP infighting.

title: TikTok CEO Vanessa Pappas steps down
description: Vanessa Pappas is stepping down as TikTok's chief operating officer. Zenia Mucha, who spent two decades at Disney, has been hired as chief brand and communications officer.

title: Rep. George Santos’ $500K bond was guaranteed by his father and his aunt
description: Several media organizations, including NBCUniversal News Group, had requested that the court unseal the names of the bond guarantors, known as suretors.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene calls Lauren Boebert 'a little b----' on the House floor
description: Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Lauren Boebert argued on the House floor as Boebert tried to force a vote on her resolution to impeach President Joe Biden.

title: Biden's campaign won't be on TikTok, but wants its message there
description: President Joe Biden’s campaign will not have a TikTok account, a platform his administration has deemed a national security threat.

title: Supreme Court rules against Navajo Nation in water rights dispute
description: The Supreme Court ruled against Navajo Nation over its claims that the federal government has failed to assert the tribe's need for water access.

title: Why Victor Wembanyama is the next big NBA star
description: Victor Wembanyama will almost certainly be selected as the first pick in Thursday's draft by the San Antonio Spurs.

title: One year without Roe: Graphics show how abortion access has changed in America
description: Data shows how abortion has changed in America one year after the Supreme Court’s Dobbs decision overturned Roe v. Wade, removing federal abortion protections.

title: 'Straight out of a horror movie': Massive hail storm injures nearly 100 concertgoers
description: A powerful hail storm crashed down on concertgoers at a Louis Tomlinson show in Colorado on Wednesday night, injuring nearly 100 people including at least seven who were taken to local hospitals.

title: At least 3 dead after tornado hits Texas town, destroying homes and businesses
description: At least three people are dead after a tornado struck Matador, Texas, on Wednesday, destroying buildings and flipping over semitrucks, according to officials and reports from the town.

title: Desperate push to find missing Titanic sub before oxygen supply runs out
description: Desperate push to find missing Titanic sub before oxygen supply runs out

title: Harvard human remains case highlights need for body donation regulations, experts say
description: The prosecution of a former Harvard Medical School employee over an alleged human remains theft ring prompted experts to call for federal rules on a practice that they said is largely unregulated and has grown in recent years with the rise of for-profit “body brokers."
